Package View_Components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountryButton
    CountryButton This class is for CountryButton object CountryButtons are buttons on the window representing countries and receiving user actions
    ImagePanel
    ImagePanel This class is for showing images on the window
    MapPanel
    MapPanel JPanel as a container for the map(countries and their relations)
    PhasePanel
    PhasePanel This is a JPanel showing information about current phase
    SidePanel
    SidePanel This class is to used to show information about players
    StartManu
    StartManu This class is start menu window that will be shown at the beginning of this game
    Window
    Window This class is used as the window to contain game view components
